readable.title: 3550276904_19de3561c5
readable.content: An adult and a child sitting down and both are biting their finger nails . An older woman sits next to a small girl who is wearing a striped dress . An old woman is sitting next to a young girl with her fingers in her mouth . An old woman with a big bag in her lap sits next to a little girl in a stripe , orange dress . A young girl with two fingers in her mouth sitting next to an older woman .
